About me

My name is Dmitrii

I am a beginner front-end developer with experience in hosting administration, currently looking for a job. On this page you can find the information about my skills, my projects, and ways to contact me.

Content Management System(CMS)
Installation and configuration of such CMS as: Joomla, WordPress and others.

DNS and MAIL
I have experience with DNS servers and resource records and setting up mail servers.

React

Node.js

This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - "brains" that will perform actions that the user does not see
